SELECT ni.id, ni.user_code, ni.user_id, ni.content, ni.del_flag, ni.create_date, ni.NAME, ni.staff_id,
si.NAME as staffName, si.images as staffImages, si.phone as staffPhone
FROM notify_info ni LEFT JOIN staff_info si ON (si.id = ni.staff_id) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ni.staff_id IS NOT NULL
AND si.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.staffName},'%')
AND ni.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.content},'%')
ORDER BY ni.create_date DESC

SELECT ni.id, ni.user_code, ni.user_id, ni.content, ni.del_flag, ni.create_date, ni.NAME, ni.staff_id,
ui.NAME as userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images as userImages FROM notify_info ni LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ui.id = ni.user_id) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ni.user_id IS NOT NULL
AND ui.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.userName},'%')
AND ni.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.content},'%')
ORDER BY ni.create_date DESC
